website_summaries.verdict: This is a comfortable, accurate rangefinder that shines in low-light and wet conditions.
pros: Range of up to 1,500 yards even in adverse conditions
Features a durable build that makes it well-suited for hunting under different weather conditions
Scan function is fast and effective
cons: Not great for computing wind effects and ballistics

customer_reviews.title: Can't range anything past 550 YDS
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to range anything beyond 550yds. Nothing to compare to though so not sure. Didn't expect the full range mentioned but expected a little more for sure. Updated 6/10/2016 After 2 weeks vortex ended up shipping me a whole new unit that they tested prior to sending. MUCH better, this is what I was expecting from a rangefinder. Vortex standing behind their products is great to see!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nowak

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, sexy and feels solid in the hand, throw a clip on the side and it’s exactly what I want attached to my combat rig...except...it’s unusable in daylight. It has three brightness settings but they don’t come close to being bright enough (I’d attach pictures but for some odd reason that’s not an option). My whole family has looked through this thing and nobody thinks it’s usable during daylight. The display is also pretty lousy, it looks like a 1980’s alarm clock that is dying. Maybe I just got a bad one....either way it’s getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tough Nut

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my NV antelope hunt. Was very pleased in the ranging capability of this unit. Glass is not as nice as my Zeiss Victory PRF but it’s also much less expensive, also the Zeiss doesn’t have the ballistic angle calculations built in Ike the Vortex does which is very nice. But with that said the glass is by no means bad, it’s actually very good. Took this to the local range and the range finding is very accurate. The VIP warranty also can’t be beat, this is a main reason why I’m converting my optics to Vortex. This rangefinder is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bunntastic

customer_reviews.title: How far can you range?  Distance with the Vortex 1800 so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have been testing my Vortex 1800 over the last number of weeks on hikes. Best range I was able to achieve so far....on a large white power windmill was 1399. I took one step back to try and get 1400 and received "----" which means it could not get a reading. On non reflective-ish targets I am still experimenting. Best I have is just shy of 1000. Having a rangefinder has made me realize that 900, 1000+ yards would be a very long shot. Red display is excellent in all light conditions. Overall, I am VERY, VERY, VERY pleased with the product and would buy again. Also, Vortex lifetime warranty = peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Great-things789

customer_reviews.title: Good to 600
customer_reviews.text: Took this rangefinder out to a mile range yesterday. Had a spotter with me lazing to known metal targets. This Vortex was able to pick up metal targets to about 800 yards. Could not get a return beyond that. Definitely not at 1000 yds. We shot out to 1175 yds but used spotter’s scope to range estimate. I think this rangefinder is fine for game <600 yards. I would not try depending on this for PRS type target shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy So Far
customer_reviews.text: This is my first range finder purchase. The wide range of prices makes it difficult to evaluate the options and determine what you need to spend for something that will work for you. I opted for this product due to the Vortex name and reasonable price. Thus far, it seems to be working fine. However, I don't have a second method of checking the distance, so I don't really have any way to verify the distances it gives. I have not yet had the opportunity to take it to the range and see what distance it gives me for those various measurements. Once I do, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: TKW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The range finder I've used since 1998 finally failed. I bought the Ranger because it had all the features I was looking for. Took it outside and ranged various objects at various distances 6 times. After that the yardage numbers began to fade while in use and the right numeral of the read-out was unreadable. I expected more of a Vortex product. It's being returned....the day after I received it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OldOwl

customer_reviews.title: An excellent rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Compact and well constructed, this rangefinder is an amazing companion in the field. It’s very easy to use once you read the brief instructions, and you can hit trees and rocks and animals exactly as advertised. The package and delivery were all on point. Solid rangefinder, lifetime warranty withVortex, and the fulfillment company did everything well and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Spacemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Typical Vortex Product
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the Vortex reputation. Quick and easy range finding in good conditions. Haven't tested in adverse conditions, but works great in enough light. At times it might take a little longer or not pick up an object depending on contrast, but so far has worked very well. It was spot on at a distance I knew to be 100 yards, and have also tested it down to 15-20 yards. Will definitely be taking on the next hunting trip.
customer_reviews.author: Chest Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I have been on the hunt for a few months for a range finder ..... Doing research as well as going down to my local outdoor shop to handle different ones. I'm so glad a chose to go with the vortex. Easy to use, very rugged feel to it to go along with great optics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch rangefinder, I dont know how I lived without one for so long.
customer_reviews.text: Great rangefinder. I will check the accuracy soon (my work has reflective yardage markers out to 550 yards so it will be a good test of accuracy). Housing and buttons feel very solid, like a quality piece of equipment should. Glass is clear and readings are quick. I do wish it offered some sort of sunshade though. Under certain light conditions a glare forms. Still works just fine but it contrasts with the clear optics.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio Salsa Dish

customer_reviews.title: This model 1800 rangefinder is great!
customer_reviews.text: Rangefinder is easy to use and have used it for both bow and gun hunting to include long range shooting. I've used in at 10 yards, out to 500 yards. Its light weight, easy to operate. Couple that with low cost and outstanding warrantee, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: Great Rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, optics / zoom are great, features are a bit minimal but what more does one really need in a rangefinder other than to quickly lock on to a target and display the yardage :-). Haven't had a chance to use for golf yet but I'm hoping it's just as effective as it has been for bow hunting thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Big Worm

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product by vortex
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this item . The first time on the range , this was by far the best range finder I’ve ever used at this price point . This is accurate , lightweight . It’s set up so that the pocket clip can be switched to either side . I give it 4 stars on ease of use because it can be a little tricky learning to switch the different modes and getting it to stay . Otherwise it’s super easy to use . Don’t be afraid to purchase this product ! I highly recommend if you have the means to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Zach Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but need a tripod at long ranges
customer_reviews.text: I was able to range free handed up to 300-400 yards, closer was easier. At ranges of 500+ yards you'll need a tripod or window mount to stabilize the range finder to get readings. I was also to range through glass at close ranges of 200 or less yards. Using a tripod I found 900-1000 yards with ease.
customer_reviews.author: EureskoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This rangefinder amazes me every time I use it! I used a Bushnell rangefinder for almost 8 years so I was used to being pleased with 300 yard braced measurements... But with this Vortex I'm routinely getting 800 to 1,000 yard measurements OFF HAND. And the adjustable brightness red readouts are a pure dream!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Kahler

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality and performance. Ranged a deer out to 600 yds through acrylic windows. The illuminated reticle was key in low light. Extremely simple and easy to operate. I do wish it had dust covers for the lenses or a completely closed case.
customer_reviews.author: W. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Vortex...the best for money and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Vortex that I have purchased. First one for me...second for a friend. Guess what my son gets next year for Christmas. Yep. Number 3. We are all bow hunters. You cannot buy any better for the money. I have had more expensive....did not work any better.
customer_reviews.author: Redoubt Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Best Sub 350.00 Rangefinder I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress this enough... You get what you pay for. Vortex Hands down, delivers the best quality Glass: Clear and lets a ton of light in Display: Red (Adjustable) easy to see Functions: Easy to change modes Angle: Works great adjusting for angle Scan Mode: Works flawless every time This is the Rangefinder you've been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Elam

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the cheap one I bought and finally replaced because it was inaccurate and cheap. You get what you pay for, save your pennies and get a good one that is quality built and very accurate. Vortex stands behind their products. I have a Vortex Viper 6-24x50 and a Vortex red dot as well and I love them also.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Vortex Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Once you see how to use it, it's super easy. Would definitely recommend to any serious shooter. Can't beat that Vortex quality and warranty
customer_reviews.author: ECop

customer_reviews.title: Vortex Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Rfinder does everything I need it to do. I shoot and hunt in the very thick woods of the north Georgia Mountains and this allows me to pick targets between trees and branches very nicely. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: David S. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: These are the best! They work every time
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! They work every time, every where. Unless your picking something up within 10 yards. I've picked up trees out to 1193 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Nelson

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. I have not used in wet weather yet. I was surprised at how small it is, my last range finder (much older generation) was quite bulky. This fits in your jacket pocket. Easy to use. Read 200, 201, 200, on the 200 yard targets at the rifle range, so I trust its accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: DaveF-Pgh

customer_reviews.title: Spending more won’t buy you better than VORTEX.
customer_reviews.text: It ranged my Elk for me at 830 yards, dialed the scope and filled the freezer. Ranged my daughters at 980 yards and more of the same. VORTEX makes great products. My hunting partners expensive super high end RF wasn’t good past 700.
customer_reviews.author: VERNON D.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this Rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this Rangefinder. It is very precise and easy to use. Also, I love the Vortex has a great warrantly. I hope I don't have to use it but I love that they will fix it if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: G Baker

customer_reviews.title: A must have for huning!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for hunting out of a stand. It was very accurate, and it helped me sight in on a couple of deer that made it into my freezer. Instructions wre clear, unit is rugged and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Wheelgunner

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty
customer_reviews.text: Many rangefinders operate similar ways, weigh similarly, etc. With Vortex you get the unconditional lifetime warranty, you'd be ignorant to not consider their products.
customer_reviews.author: cfarmer_13

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Rangefinder!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rangefinder is worth every cent and more!!! The red display is easy on my old eyes and I ranged several landmarks way before sunrise and this thing accurately measured the range while I was 30 feet in the air. If you need a great quality rangefinder then buy this one, it is light, simple to use, give you the true horizonal distance while elevated and the display is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: More than I imagined and I have very high standards
customer_reviews.text: Mostly for hunting and amazing to use with the HDC feature but I used it playing golf and set to LOS mode it’s great! I sometimes had to use the scan mode to make sure I was on target - but WOW
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: A warranty you can rely on for a replacement should it malfunction.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clear rangefinder. Best of the best when it comes to the lifetime warranty. Anyone who has bought an expensive rangefinder will find issues over time that are not covered.
customer_reviews.author: Decker

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. Easy to switch from yards to meters and vise versa. Hit a tree top at 1,300 meters. I dont think I'll ever shoot that way but it's nice to know it can range that far and in like less then a second.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used it at the public shooting range to measure the distance from the bench to the targets. Close enough at 50, 100 & 200 yards. The glass is clear & bright. Easy to read the measurements & 6X is perfect for finding the targets quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Avid hunter who’s had plenty of range finders. This is easily the best. The display has three brightness mode all of which are easy to read. Operation is as easy as it comes. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more for a superior product. Vortex has become my favorite optics brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Krajacic

customer_reviews.title: Good basic rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: I compared this one with Sig Sauer BDX rangefinder. Vortex is better build and that made it heavier as well. Regarding to the accuracy they are just about the same for hunting purposes. Sig Sauer does have more features with a slightly better price if you look around.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, just wish I could figure out to adjust the clarity, it didn’t come with a book and the menu button doesn’t do anything but it will range distances pretty well. Maybe there is a trick to using the menu button but it’s in the book that never shipped with the unit, hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bryan b

customer_reviews.title: Very quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. Ease of use out of the box is fantastic. Pop in the included battery, point at desired target, press button and very bright distance displayed. I’m super excited to see how it does this archery season. Will be adding another review after more use, but expectations are good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value buy. We use this to find targets in the desert and it has been a good so far. Glare is minimal and the display is easy to read. Not bad for a beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Red LED makes other range finders obsolete.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a range finder with red led that can be seen in all light conditions. This senior really appreciate this function. Makes all other range finders obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Very nice display.. has 3 modes of brightness to choose from and very easy to see and setup. Will not range through a window so if you're wondering why it wont range anything try to go outside or atleast open the window because it will range through a screen. Highly satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: Nate b.

customer_reviews.title: and I like the adjustable red display for low
customer_reviews.text: Takes a second to come up with a reading sometimes. But works very well, and I like the adjustable red display for low light
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: I use this weekly at the range and get excellent results (shooting 100 to 597 yds). Sighting range extends to 1800 yds. Very light weight. If I ever lost mine, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: coefficient

customer_reviews.title: 1800 review
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, light weight, but it's blurry when i try to focus on sth.
customer_reviews.author: JIAN GANG WU

customer_reviews.title: Excellence in a range finder.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the Vortex has a great warranty. I like it's compact size. I love the reversible belt clip. The performance is outstanding! It is rugged. It works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Angler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Another great vortex product backed by the industries best warranty. Can’t go wrong with vortex products
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you’d expect from vortex!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I picked this brand and model!! Super compact to pack up the mountain with you, easy to use even with the thickest of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Still getting familiar with the product.
customer_reviews.text: I chose the subject because I have had excellent experience with Vortex products. I am still getting familiar with this range-finder and haven't got to try it in required use. So far, I am very satisfied. Ask me a year from now.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Zebich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Beautiful and Precise. Like made by aliens
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Exceeded all expectations. Beautiful design, small and versatile. Satisfies all my shooting and hunting needs. Clear view. Focus adjusted by eyepiece. Comes with belt pouch. Love it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Vahagn

customer_reviews.title: Rugged good quality device
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find out it had an illuminated reticle. Rugged good quality device.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, clear optics
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, clear optics. All the quality you expect from Vortex at a fabulous price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Train

customer_reviews.title: Just the best rangefinder. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The display is super bright (and adjustable).Accurate,and easy to use. The warranty is of course unbeatable. You can buy a vortex and have it for life. That makes this a no brainer for me. If you want the best...you're looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Meatydojo

customer_reviews.title: Just what the dr ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is prefect and as accurate as a surveyors measure. The only "issue" is its inability to scope black targets. But perfect unless you are ranging black bears. Range a dog today at 849yds. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: boyd

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use small enough to fit in front pocket on bibs while hunting so nice to be able to see exactly how many yards away my target is.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Great range finder
customer_reviews.text: Awesome range finder, has great features and clarity. The 6 time zoom is just about perfect, I like the radicle and brightness settings. Nothing to complain about!
customer_reviews.author: Broc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is very happy with this range finder! The best part is the warranty! Should never have to purchase another one. Ranged at 850 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Schooleys02

customer_reviews.title: Three thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: From what I've been able to tell so far, it's very accurate. Havent had any problems other than my shaky hands. Very good quality, as you would expect from a vortex product.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY GALE

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with these. Works well. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Well made great quality
customer_reviews.text: Glad I went with the model that has lighted reticals. Super fast readings and love the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great Range Finder
customer_reviews.text: I am color blind and was afraid I would not be able to use the newer Range Finders. At first I couldn't see the crosshairs. However, there is a contrast adjustment that made it perfect! Nice and clear and very accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Donna  Estis

customer_reviews.title: quality is fair for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price it works great out to 700 yards hits targets easily and comes back with range quickly...anything past that i had trouble getting reliable data...glass is on par for a $300 rangefinder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This ones a winner! A+
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this unit! I have been ranging reflective and non reflective targets between 300-1000 yards successfully with quick and accurate results. Nice lightweight package that is easy to operate and has great fit and finish! Vortex knocked this one out of the park! Longest successful ranging in clear daylight conditions is 1010 yards! This thing is great however if you are going to be ranging at or around it max range frequently I would step it up to the 1500 yard model!
customer_reviews.author: angelr15

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product- highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to range distances while hunting. This product works great and would definitely recommend to other hunters!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Collins

customer_reviews.title: accuracy
customer_reviews.text: this is the best rangefinder on the market as far as i am concerned
customer_reviews.author: glen westervelt

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should well past 500 yards.
customer_reviews.text: Vortex Optics Ranger 1800 Laser... I've used it out to 932 yards. Lightweight easy to operate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Weiser

customer_reviews.title: Great Rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Came in lightning speed like before noon the Same day. Vortex is the best in optics for the price
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to field test a lot test, but so far it seems to be great. Been ranging things around home and it's very impressive. More comfortable and easier to pack asserting than my older Nikon 1200.
customer_reviews.author: Tackleberry

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Have trouble getting it to read more than i should
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Its a Vortex so what else would you expect.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible. So accurate and easy to use. It's a Vortex so what else would you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the range. I've used it out to 1,620 yard with no issues at all. Great for golf too.
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I live in the desert so for me the display could be brighter but its bright out here. Otherwise it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: More than i need but its there if i need it. Good price for the range!
customer_reviews.text: Great range finder! Extremely accurate and easy to use. The scan feature works flawlessly. I've only had the opportunity to use it out to what i know is 600 yards and it read 601. Better than the +/- 3 yards as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wagenecht

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The size is great and it works for my hunting and even golfing needs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, Small, Light Weight and Accurate with a life time warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: this is great. ranged 850yards one time. always got 600 out of it. worth the money. lost mine is the swamps hunting this season. will be getting another asap. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JB84

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go!
customer_reviews.text: As with all Vortex products, seems solidly constructed and works just fine. The lifetime warranty is a major bonus.
customer_reviews.author: LP8256

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with the vortex rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with the vortex rangefinder. Review many, this was the best for the money. No regrets and I am a very picky shopper.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for ranging steel at 1k.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate range finding out to at least 1k. Perfect for long range shooting as well as hunting.
customer_reviews.author: TITUSROCK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful so sleek . Works perfect and easy to use... I have used it out to 1500 yards
customer_reviews.author: Eric torall Montejano

customer_reviews.title: This has really helped me eye ball ranges must faster ...
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped me eye ball ranges much faster. It's a little questionable at the 850 to 1000 range, sometimes you get the number sometimes you don't. I also found the clip is a little loose, I wrapped some electrical tape around the end, now it stay put on my pack.
customer_reviews.author: A_Bar

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ranger 1000 is my first range finder. It is easy to use. Make sure the brightness is set high before you leave your house, once your outside if the brightness is to low you can't see the numbers well enough to use or adjust them back up. Just like all firearms used in the field it's a matter of training. At first you will think it's off(distance wise) but I'm a noob it was just me who was off.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable product. However the view has been blurry since new. I've tried multiple cleaning methods to improve the view. All functions work well, and I use it often, but disappointed in the optics.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable warranty
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and effective. 900 yard max. non-reflective target acquisitions. Small in size and easy cary options. Absolutely cannot beat the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: 1guyzopinion

customer_reviews.title: Love vortex products
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to open it and pop the battery in. I was shooting distances on everything once I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chukala

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but not even close to advertised distance capability
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear optics, spot on at 200yds ! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy A

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Used it to set targets at the right distances for zeroing my rifles. Close to 100 yards found it hard to keep on target. This is more my inability to hold it still I think. Worked great mounted on a tripod for 100+ yards.
customer_reviews.author: Geemboomba

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Range finder works great love the red read out instead of the normal black read out.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: A++++++++
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Works well and a easy buy !
customer_reviews.author: William Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best I could find for the money. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jkokojan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for over six months, so glad I held out, easy to use and great accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Its fast
customer_reviews.text: I really like the range finder. it returns the range really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product as always from Vortex. Lens is clear and range is accurate
customer_reviews.author: Luke P

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Vary happy with this product. I have there razor binoculars and I have to say this company knows what they are doing and the warranty can't be beat keep up the good work. Ranger is dead on with other rangers that I have compared it to. I was able to range a deer out past there 500 yard mark at 580 haven't tested it beound that but where I hunt I don't need to go any further than that.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product and works better than anything I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product and works better than anything I have ever used. Accurate and easy to use.. Optical is the best I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It's compact and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I took this on an elk hunt this year and it worked flawlessly. I lost my old trusty range finder on an antelope hunt 2 years ago and shopped hard for a replacement. I "settled" on this one. It's compact and easy to carry. The elk hunting was a bit slow, so I got to play with this rangefinder a bit. It would routinely range out past 1000 yards. It was interesting to see the variances in the distance to the target when playing with the Horizontal Component Distance mode. You can't beat their warranty either. I would highly recommend this rangefinder.
customer_reviews.author: C Cov

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Range Finder
customer_reviews.text: Very clear. The red display makes the yardage easy to read in lower light conditions. Vortex is a great company with a transferable lifetime guarantee.. love it
customer_reviews.author: jwk24

customer_reviews.title: I will keep you posted
customer_reviews.text: This works very well though I have not had much chance to use it over 700 yards. Has made it through some hunting trips already.
customer_reviews.author: Roebear

customer_reviews.title: Best waranty ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rang finder th only thing I wish it had was a tenth place (.0) fo yardage
customer_reviews.author: Josh Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rangefinder!
customer_reviews.text: Great little (tiny compared to others) rangefinder and very accurate. The only thing that could be improved is the ranging time (about 1-2 seconds), but with a warranty like Vortex's VIP warranty this is to good a deal to pass up. Couldn't ask for a better pair of rangefinders from a more reliable company!
customer_reviews.author: stacy lyn harris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good but not in long distance. About 700 meters only not 1000 like its name.
customer_reviews.author: Narek

product_meta.title: Vortex Optics Ranger Laser Rangefinders
feature_bullets: The Ranger 1800 rangefinder is easy to use and features a clean, illuminated display and highly intuitive menu. The Ranger 1800 is capable of ranging up to 1,800 yards.

The primary HCD mode displays an angle compensated distance that is ideal for the majority of hunters and shooters. An advanced LOS mode provides you the option to calculate long distance, high angle shots with increased precision.
A scan feature gives continuous range readings as you pan across a landscape or track a moving target. Three brightness settings allow the display to stay visible in various light conditions.

Fully multi-coated lenses deliver optimal light transmission. Textured rubber armor provides a secure, non-slip grip. Water and fogproof performance keep the system operating in the harshest conditions.
The included neck lanyard and removable utility clip make the Ranger easy to pack and keep handy. Compatible with a tripod adapter, allowing use on a tripod or car window mount.
